title: Who is responsible for parking enforcement on Tiburon Dr?  Everyday I see cars parked directly in front of fire hydrants, not to mention cars parked on the wrong side of the street (against the flow of traffic) and so far from the curb that it effectively becomes a one lane road.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/08/who-is-responsible-for-parking-enforcement-on-tiburon-drive/
